title: The Shook-Up Shopping Cart
description: Uncle Cedric is a sentient anthropomorphic shopping cart who is always getting into trouble.
quote: His right front wheel is sort of wobbly.
altHero: a woman and a man with a gun look at a shopping cart
alt1: two robbers wearing striped shirts and eye masks point guns at the couple
alt2: the woman holds up her hands in fear and smacks the man in the face
alt3: the shopping cart zooming down the street
alt4: one of the robbers covered in paint
